aboutAction.title: About NADIA
aboutAction.message:
NADIA stands for Natural Dialogue System and is a set of components that deals with the creation of spoken dialogue systems.
While Maren Soetebier created this user interface, Markus M. Berg designed NADIA.
You can learn more about NADIA at: http://mmberg.net/nadia

saveFileAction.title: How to save this XML file
saveFileAction.message:
If you add or delete an element, this XML File will be automatically saved. If you change the name of an element, it will be also saved.
For more information ask the developer MarenS (Maren Soetebier) at Github.
